### Part 2.1.a)

Importing required modules.

```{r}

library(factoextra)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)


```

i) 

```{r}

set.seed(123) # setting a seed for the pseudo-random numbers
rm(list=ls())
df <- read.csv(file = "file19.txt",     # TXT data file indicated as string or full path to the file
           header = TRUE,    # Whether to display the header (TRUE) or not (FALSE)
           sep = "",          # Separator of the columns of the file
           dec = ".", 
           skip = 20, 
           strip.white = TRUE,
           skipNul = TRUE)         # Character used to separate decimals of the numbers in the file

plot(df, main="Raw points")
typeof(df)
head(df)


```

### Part 2.1.b)

i) 

```{r}
#Getting the optimal number of clusters

dataframe <- df[, 2:9]

fviz_nbclust(dataframe, kmeans, method = "wss") +
geom_vline(xintercept = 3, linetype = 2)


```

ii) 

```{r}

# Running K-means

k <- kmeans(dataframe, centers=3, nstart=25)
fviz_cluster(k, data=dataframe)


```
